question:
With reference to the communication against 5 countries to the UN by climate activists, consider the following statements about Convention on the Rights of the Child Committee:
  1. The committee oversees the implementation of the convention (CRC) only in the member nations.
  2. The committee addresses complaints against all UN member countries.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The CRC committee oversees the implementations of the conventionsâ€™ provisions. It takes in reports from the member states every 5 years to assess their progress. The committee also takes in reports from NGOs and other sources about the member nations. Statement 2 is incorrect: The committee can address complaints only against those countries that have ratified the Optional Protocol. The Optional Protocol was adopted in 2011. Till date only 45 countries have ratified it. Brazil, France, Germany, Argentina and Turkey have ratified the protocol.
